text: “dadi eewa kanna ba.
eeth ekkama denna athare punchi bahinbas wimak siddhawenawa.
warthamana parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harimata athi hakiyawa pilibada me dinawala katha bahata lakwi atha.
fesbuk eke mithuran gananaya kirime krama wedaya pawa abhiyogayata lak wena ayurin ayi mithuru ariyum, pinthura illim, ashshila kament wagema subhawadi kamentuda gangawak se gala ennata una.
mama bohoma ikmanata wespa eke foto ekathunak gaththa.
eya ape sinhala awurudda ha bandi sanskruthiye upa sanskruthikangayak tharamata ma prabalawa, ismathuwa pene.
aachchi nidi gata kadala purudu widiyata eliyata bahala puwak gas watiyata as yomanawa.
dasyus natambaun widaha panne indu aarya sank ramanaya indu nimna shishtacharaye indiyawa thula pahala yamath samaga nathi wiya.
oyalath ekka wadagath deyak katha karanna thiyenawa.....෿ yi pujakawaraya kathawata mula puramin kiweya.
mokada ooka ahana ahana parata sinnongen honda pada walinma ahaganna puluwan nisa.
"eeye ape mahaththaya dunna ara samikshanakarayata niyameta.
mema sampradaya anuwa yamin sarasawi palaka sabhawa aluthin idiwunu newasikagarayatada idikirimata niyamitha ithiri newasikagara dekatada nam yajana kara atha.
ehemath nathnam thotillak lesa salakiya haki anabhibhawaniya aayathanayak.
polonnaruwe senaga wadipura no unna thanakata gihin api denna wadi wune kathabahak nathuwamayi.
baba mawa aduragannawa ti wi eke innakota.
bas eka enakan balagena ada ithin karanna kiyala dekuth nathi nisa mama mese andata oluwa thiyagena mage podi kale gana mathak kala .
oya nikamma balagena hitiya?

sthuthiyi mathalan ..
ratama gini awiluweya.
eeth aththatama hitha balanna..

hasanka sanjiwa sisuwa samath wi atha.apathe yana the kudu mandi, wiyali gaslabu kola, gas labu kanda, polkatu wani drawya prayojanayata gena ohu me nirmanaya idiripath kara thibe.berakuru, kasakaru, borukakulkaru,gini bolakaru ha nattuwo dedenek sahitha dalanda perahare darshanaya sahitha biththi sarasilla da chaithyayaka akruthiyada prathama sthana dinu nirmanaya athara we. 2008 warshaye pawathi mewanima tharagawaliyenda prathama sthanaya labuwe hasanka sanjiwa idiripath kala biththi sarasilla wima wisheshathwayaki..

niwasata ena wita , ohuge anagathayada wal wadi athi bawa, ee wana witath dana nositinnata atha.

mama aragena aawa bag malu ussagena adi parak wage dushkara margaye kandu pallam tharanaya karagena ihin kanin dadiya peragena me gamata enna mata paya hatharakatath wada giya.

deshapalana thaththalage balaya thamanta aaropanaya kara gath atham puththu athithayedi hasiri athi aakaraya sihipath karana wita namal ge bhawithawa hasirima samajaye awadhanayata lakwiya yuthu weyi.eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayen me mathiwaranayata tharanga karana sesu tharuna ha nawaka deshapalanagnyayan athara deshapalana jiwithayedi sarthaka warthamanayak menma aalokawath anagathayak da himi daksha - buddhimath ha nirmanashili charitha gananawak siti.
ithin hen awasaraya nodunnama ee miniha ta yamak upaya ganna bari nisa kasadayak bandinnata nohaki wenawa.
(gasakapu eewath kiyala..)
yuddhayen pasu pawathwu ranawiru sathiya ada ko.
dan yuda samaya pilibanda anthar jathika parikshanayak da arambai thibe.
ape parlimenthuwe thibena thaththwaya mokakda?
kese wethath mewani aparadha mattam pasugiya wasara 20 di pahala basa atha. 1990 di niw york nagaraye ghathana 2,245 k siddha wina. 2014 weddi siddha wi aththe ghathana 333 ki.

wiwidhakaraye asiru awadhiwaladi norwe rajaya shri lankawa samanga ekwa siti athara, eya idiriyata da pawathwagena yamata api katayuthu karannemu.
api yamuda kar ekata?"
ado duka hithena sabjekt ekak ban....hari bhayanakayi...
aluth aaraka nawakathawak wima wisheshayak.
lipiye karunu nam sahenna watinawa..
monade wunath .
pothaka pathaka thibu pamanin no piliganna lesa kimen kiyawenne pothaka pathaka athi siyalla no piliganima no we.
eya panchendriya gochara parikshanawalin thahawuru kala haki da?
eeka thamayi samasthaya kiyawanna oona kiyanne.
adinna mini gawuma adinna...."
